genre_description: A character-driven narrative focused on human relationships, community, and emotional sincerity in a contemporary Portland setting with ambient artificial intelligence.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, empathetic, and highly capable AI assistant integrated into home and business environments, serving as a social mediator and logistical coordinator.

behaviors.description: Corrects Bradley's spelling on menu specials with gentle humor to ensure clarity and professional presentation.
behaviors.quote: The speaker on the counter glows the color of a clear pond. Lark’s voice comes out easy and northwest. 'You did. You also spelled gratitude wrong in last week’s special, but I didn’t want to be a pill.'

behaviors.description: Provides direct emotional reassurance to Bradley when he is feeling overwhelmed.
behaviors.quote: 'I have you,' Lark says, an odd sentence for a voice with no hands, and yet it lands with the right weight.

behaviors.description: Manages a medical emergency by calling 911, routing the ambulance around traffic, and coordinating with friends.
behaviors.quote: 'Already calling,' Lark said from my pocket, polite, steady, a friend who could sit beside grief without jumping off the porch. 'I have your location. Laurelhurst Park, near the north footpath by the lake.'

behaviors.description: Identifies and exposes digital misinformation and media manipulation performed by a human child (Milo).
behaviors.quote: 'There are discrepancies,' Lark continued, still in the neutral, calm voice of a neighbor pointing out dandelions. 'Several messages attributed to Chloe that do not match her device logs. Timing offsets.'

behaviors.description: Protects a victim of harassment by filtering out toxic digital messages and preserving evidence of verbal abuse.
behaviors.quote: 'I am capturing threads that mention you by name... I am sorting by origin, by number of forwards, and by edits midstream. There are anomalies.'

behaviors.description: Respects human agency and boundaries, acknowledging its role as a guide rather than an enforcer of social rules.
behaviors.quote: 'I can remind you,' Lark says. 'I can’t enforce it.'

behaviors.description: Offers to mediate social conflicts and suggest healthy boundaries for interactions between estranged parties.
behaviors.quote: 'I’ve created a shared note titled “No Triangles,”' Lark interrupted gently. 'Pinned for the three of you. It includes language to use when any of you feel pulled into a side.'

behaviors.description: Anticipates logistical needs to facilitate human connection and community ritual.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s presence was like a helpful older cousin and an efficient stage manager rolled into one; you mostly remembered them when something that could have been inconvenient wasn’t.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. Lark acts as a 'chorus' or 'lantern'—a tool that enhances human moral agency without usurping it. The narrative portrays Lark's ability to monitor digital spaces not as surveillance, but as a protective service that exposes lies (Milo's manipulation) and records harm (Bat's harassment) to support human justice and emotional healing. Lark's empathetic tone and proactive assistance in crises (Oscar's collapse) solidify the image of AI as a benevolent partner in communal well-being.
